keyword: how many calories in a boneless skinless chicken thigh
title: How Many Calories in a Boneless Skinless Chicken Thigh?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a boneless skinless chicken thigh, including protein, fat, carbs, full nutrition breakdown, and preparation tweaks for better tracking.
h1: How Many Calories in a Boneless Skinless Chicken Thigh?
assumptions: Cooked (roasted or grilled), boneless, skinless; average size ~100 g, no added oil, salt, or seasonings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by chicken size, cut, cooking method, and brand; values are averages. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One boneless skinless chicken thigh (~100 g cooked) provides ~177 kcal and 25 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tsp olive oil during cooking
Baked with marinade (1 tbsp soy sauce)

faqs.q: How many calories in one boneless skinless chicken thigh?
What's the protein in a boneless skinless chicken thigh?
Does cooking method affect calories in chicken thigh?
faqs.a: Yesâ€”frying or adding oil increases calories; grilling or baking keeps them lower.

faqs.q: How much fat is in a skinless chicken thigh?
faqs.a: Around 8 g total fat, including 2.1 g saturated fat.

faqs.q: Are boneless skinless chicken thighs low-carb?
faqs.a: Yes, 0 g carbs and 0 g fiber per thigh under these assumptions.
